title: Hen hop (TEFC)
brief_description: A cartoon film in which a hen, sometimes a Leghorn, at other times a Plymouth Rock, and even an egg with feet, dance to the old time waltzes and reels of French-Canadian barn dance music. A cartoon film hand-drawn with pen and ink by Norman McLaren, with colour added optically. Used to publicise a Victory Bond drive.
